languages.text: "Но что касается твоей подружки с мира-корабля... о, ты вскоре с ней встретишься. Мне кажется, тебе не терпится взглянуть в глаза той, что привела тебя ко мне, не так ли?"
"As for your little friend from the craftworld... Oh, you are going to meet her soon. I bet you cannot wait to look into the eyes of the one who brought you to me, can you?"
languages.original_text: "Но что касается твоей подружки с мира-корабля... о, ты вскоре с ней встретишься. Мне кажется, тебе не терпится взглянуть в глаза той, что привела тебя ко мне, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: "As for your little friend from the Craftworld... Oh, you are going to meet her soon. I bet you cannot wait to look into the eyes of the one who brought you to me, can you?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: « Quant à votre amie du vaisseau-monde... Vous la rencontrerez bientôt. J'imagine que vous êtes {mf|impatient|impatiente} de vous trouver face à celle qui vous a {mf|conduit|conduite} jusqu'à moi, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "As for your little friend from the craftworld... Oh, you are going to meet her soon. I bet you cannot wait to look into the eyes of the one who brought you to me, can you?"

traits.locale_text: « Quant à votre amie du vaisseau-monde... Vous la rencontrerez bientôt. J'imagine que vous êtes {mf|impatient|impatiente} de vous trouver face à celle qui vous a {mf|conduit|conduite} jusqu'à moi, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: “至于你那位来自方舟世界的小朋友……噢，你很快就会见到她了。就是她把你带到了我的身边。我敢说，你肯定迫不及待想见她一面了，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "As for your little friend from the craftworld... Oh, you are going to meet her soon. I bet you cannot wait to look into the eyes of the one who brought you to me, can you?"

traits.locale_text: “至于你那位来自方舟世界的小朋友……噢，你很快就会见到她了。就是她把你带到了我的身边。我敢说，你肯定迫不及待想见她一面了，没错吧？”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: 「方舟から来たお友達については…まあ、もうすぐ会えるだろう。お前を俺のもとへ連れて来た者の目を見るのが待ちきれないだろう？」
languages.original_text: "As for your little friend from the craftworld... Oh, you are going to meet her soon. I bet you cannot wait to look into the eyes of the one who brought you to me, can you?"

traits.locale_text: 「方舟から来たお友達については…まあ、もうすぐ会えるだろう。お前を俺のもとへ連れて来た者の目を見るのが待ちきれないだろう？」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Was Eure kleine Freundin vom Weltenschiff betrifft ... Oh, Ihr werdet sie bald wiedersehen. Ihr könnt es bestimmt gar nicht erwarten, ihr, die Euch zu mir gebracht hat, in die Augen zu blicken, oder?"
languages.original_text: "As for your little friend from the craftworld... Oh, you are going to meet her soon. I bet you cannot wait to look into the eyes of the one who brought you to me, can you?"

traits.locale_text: "Was Eure kleine Freundin vom Weltenschiff betrifft ... Oh, Ihr werdet sie bald wiedersehen. Ihr könnt es bestimmt gar nicht erwarten, ihr, die Euch zu mir gebracht hat, in die Augen zu blicken, oder?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: «En cuanto a tu amiguita del mundo astronave... Oh, muy pronto te reunirás con ella. Seguro que estás deseando mirar a los ojos de aquella que te ha traído hasta mí, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "As for your little friend from the craftworld... Oh, you are going to meet her soon. I bet you cannot wait to look into the eyes of the one who brought you to me, can you?"

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a tu amiguita del mundo astronave... Oh, muy pronto te reunirás con ella. Seguro que estás deseando mirar a los ojos de aquella que te ha traído hasta mí, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Gemidünyadan gelen küçük arkadaşına gelirsek... Çok yakında görüşeceksiniz. Seni bana getirenin gözlerinin içine bakmak için sabırsızlanıyorsundur, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "As for your little friend from the craftworld... Oh, you are going to meet her soon. I bet you cannot wait to look into the eyes of the one who brought you to me, can you?"

traits.locale_text: "Gemidünyadan gelen küçük arkadaşına gelirsek. Ah, çok yakında bir araya geleceksiniz. Seni bana getiren kişinin gözlerinin içine bakmak için sabırsızlanıyorsundur, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
